Today I announced @UKLabour’s new social contract for veterans.

We will

🔴End the scandal of veterans sleeping rough on our streets
🔴Guarantee free education and training  
🔴Treat mental health issues, like PTSD, as seriously as physical health issues

#ForTheMany #RealChange https://t.co/KaWrGRV0W9

Because that is what we stand for.
#VoteLabour #ForTheMany https://t.co/XM29o42Gak

That's real change. #RealChange #VoteLabour2019 #GeneralElection19 🌹 https://t.co/24hZoGfcpQ
